name: Blindsense
description: {race-plural} can sense thinking creatures with a range of 30 feet. They cannot sense mindless creatures or those immune to mind-affecting magic with this awareness.

name: Low-Light Blindness
description: {race-plural} treat dim light as if it were darkness.

name: Open
description: Other creatures receive a +6 bonus to Sense Motive checks against an {race-singular} who is using telepathy to communicate with them. {race-plural} gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks when using telepathy to communicate.

name: Telepathy
description: {race-plural} have telepathy with a range of {range} feet.

name: Third Eye
description: {race-plural} gain a +2 racial bonus to Perception and Sense Motive checks.
